title: Climatescope in the Media - Asia Highlights
content:
CLIMATESCOPE IN THE MEDIA - ASIA HIGHLIGHTS

Mainland China

中证网CS.com.cn, 19 December 2016

发展中国家领跑全球清洁能源开发 (Developing countries take clean energy lead globally)

经济网ceweekly.cn, 19 December 2016

彭博报告：发展中国家领跑全球清洁能源开发 中国列第一 (Developing countries take clean energy lead globally, Mainland China ranks No.1)

中金网 cngold.com.cn, 19 December 2016

发展中国家领跑“全球清洁能源开发” 中国占比最高 (Developing countries take clean energy lead globally, Mainland China tops the ranking)

中国能源网 cnenergy.org, 19 December 2016

彭博研究报告显示——发展中国家领跑全球清洁能源开发 (Bloomberg Climatescope: Developing countries take clean energy lead globally, Mainland China tops the ranking)

中国环保在线 Mainland China Environmental Protection Portal

习大大再度发声环保：尽可能利用清洁能源 (President Xi: Use clean energy as much as possible)

36氪 36Kr, 24 December 2016

太阳能发电成本正在低于煤炭，这是58个新兴市场资本的共同努力 (Solar power cost falls, an outcome of collaborative effort by 58 emerging markets)

商务部 Ministry of Commerce

肯尼亚清洁能源投资居Climatescope 排名第十位 (Kenya ranks No. 10 in Climatescope clean energy research)

India

Energy World – The Economic Times , 15 December 2016

Developing nations taking the lead in clean energy with new projects and pledges: BNEF

The Telegraph India, 15 December 2016

With New Pledges and Projects, Developing Countries Take Clean Energy Lead Globally

Yahoo! Finance India, 16 December 2016

Solar power slowly becoming world’s cheapest form of electricity, analysts say

India Business Times, 16 December 2016

Solar power slowly becoming world’s cheapest form of electricity, analysts say

News Bharati, 20 December 2016

Solar Power is cheapest form of new electricity

The Hindu, 24 December 2016

Where solar power brings hope

News Express, December 2016

Solar power slowly becoming world’s cheapest form of electricity, analysts say

India Environmental Portal, 15 December 2016

Climatescope 2016: the clean energy country competitiveness index

Japan

無料株価情報 ADVFN, 16 December 2016

新しい公約と新しいプロジェクトで、開発途上国がクリーンエネルギーを世界的にリード (With new pledges and projects, developing countries lead the world in clean energy)

スマートジャパン IT Media Japan, 26 December 2016

自然エネルギー：日本の投資がアフリカへ、躍り出る途上国の再エネ (Renewable Energy: Japan makes investment in Africa)

日経テクノロジーオンライン Nikkei Technology Online, December 2016

新興国の再エネ導入量、2015年に先進国を18％上回る (Emerging nations build 18% more renewable capacity than developed countries in 2015)

Korea

Metro Seoul, 20 December 2016

중국발 에너지 혁명…태양광 ‘가장 저렴한 에너지원’ 되다 (Mainland China’s energy revolution… Solar is the cheapest energy source)

Malaysia

Computerworld Malaysia, 20 December 2016

Solar power is becoming the cheapest form of new electricity

Singapore

Computer World Singapore, 20 December 2016

Solar power is becoming the cheapest form of new electricity
